info.content: The disregard and disdain for these rights have led and continue to lead man to commit crimes against nature and against animals
The recognition by the human species of the right to existence of other animal species constitutes the foundation of the coexistence of species in the world;
Genocides are committed by man and others are threatened
The respect for animals by men is linked to the respect of men for each other
Education should teach from childhood to observe, understand, respect and love animals.
